targets.query: metricset.module:system AND metricset.name:filesystem AND NOT (system.filesystem.mount_point:"/vagrant" OR system.filesystem.mount_point:"/home/vagrant/exchange" OR system.filesystem.mount_point:"/vagrant/download" OR system.filesystem.mount_point:"/home/vagrant/ansible") AND beat.hostname:$hostname
